name: Super Vadimka VII: The Nightmares of The Current Continue
name_original: Super Vadimka VII: The Nightmares of The Current Continue
description: Super Vadimka VII: The Nightmares of The Current Continue -  this is a computer game it was released on February 25, 2023 for Windows and developed by VadimBallzGame and HyperTheLoopa420 is the seventh part of a series of games. Super Vadimka this game is a high-quality game where you have to play for. Ballcaster Vadim Kulev who has to go through more than 7 worlds this game is very difficult and even unrelated to the sequel. Super Vadimka VI: A Terrible Threat there is No Vadimka and also the seventh part was developed within 8 weeks. In the game you have to fight bosses, as well as throw an X-ball at enemies and spikes and shoot all the bosses with an asteroid gum this game is considered the best in the world.
